cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

actions.action_confirmation: Are you sure you want to run action ''{action}''?
actions.no_entity_more_info: No entity provided for more info dialog

empty_state.title: Croeso Gartref
empty_state.no_devices: Mae'r dudalen hon yn eich galluogi i reoli'ch dyfeisiau, ond mae'n edrych fel nad oes gennych ddyfeisiau wedi eu sefydlu eto. Ewch i'r dudalen integreiddio i ddechrau.

iframe.error_secure_context: Unable to load iframes pointing at websites using {target_protocol} if NDX IoT Platform is served over {context_protocol}.

recovery-mode.description: NDX IoT Platform ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in recovery mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.

starting.description: NDX IoT Platform is starting, please wait…

energy.no_data: There is no data to show. It can take up to 2 hours for new data to arrive after you configure your energy dashboard.
energy.no_data_period: There is no data for this period.

solar_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_solar_energy_used: This card indicates how much of the solar energy you produced was used by your home instead of being returned to the grid.
solar_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_solar_energy_used_charge_: If this number is typically very low, indicating excess solar production, you might want to consider charging a home battery or electric car from your solar panels at times of high solar production.
solar_consumed_gauge.not_produced_solar_energy: You have not produced any solar energy
solar_consumed_gauge.self_consumed_solar_could_not_calc: Self-consumed solar energy couldn't be calculated

self_sufficiency_gauge.card_indicates_self_sufficiency_quota: This card indicates how much of the energy consumed by your home came from on-site sources (such as solar panels or batteries).

grid_neutrality_gauge.energy_dependency: This card indicates your net energy usage.
grid_neutrality_gauge.color_explain: If the needle is in the purple, you returned more energy to the grid than you consumed from it. If it's in the blue, you consumed more energy from the grid than you returned.
grid_neutrality_gauge.grid_neutrality_not_calculated: Grid neutrality could not be calculated

carbon_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_energy_used: This card indicates how much of the energy consumed by your home was generated using non-fossil fuels like solar, wind, and nuclear. The higher, the better!
carbon_consumed_gauge.low_carbon_energy_not_calculated: Consumed low-carbon energy couldn't be calculated

unused_entities.title: Endidau heb ei ddefnyddio
unused_entities.available_entities: Rhain yw'r endidau sydd gennych ar gael, ond dim ar eich Lovelace UI eto
unused_entities.select_to_add: Dewiswch yr endidau rydych am eu hychwanegu at gerdyn ac yna cliciwch ar botwm ychwanegu cerdyn.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: Cewch chi ddim defnyddio'r swyddogaeth hon wrth ddefnyddio UI Lovelace yn modd YAML.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: You can only use this function when you have taken control of your dashboard.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: Rhaid i chi adnewyddu'r dudalen i gwblhau'r ail-lwytho, ydych chi eisiau adnewyddu rŵan?

editor.yaml_unsupported: The edit UI is not available when in YAML mode.

raw_editor.lovelace_changed: Your dashboard was updated, do you want to load the updated config in the editor and lose your current changes?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Are you sure you want to remove your dashboard configuration?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: We will automatically generate your dashboard views with your areas and devices if you remove your dashboard configuration.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: Mae gennych newidiadau heb eu cadw. Ydych chi'n siŵr bod chi eisiau gadael?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: Mae eich cyfluniad yn cynnwys sylwadau (au), ni fydd y rhain yn cael eu cadw. Ydych chi eisio parhau?
raw_editor.error_invalid_config: Dydy eich cyfluniad ddim yn ddilys: {error}
raw_editor.resources_moved: Resources should no longer be added to the dashboard configuration but can be added in the dashboard config panel.

edit_lovelace.explanation: This title is shown above all your views in the dashboard.
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Dewiswch pa ddefnyddwyr ddylai weld yr olygfa hon yn y llywio

edit_view.subview_helper: Subviews don't appear in tabs and have a back button.
edit_view.error_same_url: You cannot save a view with the same URL as a different existing view.

edit_badges.view_no_badges: Badges are not be supported by the current view type.

edit_card.pick_card: Dewiswch y cerdyn rydych eisiau ychwanegu
edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

change_position.title: Change card position
change_position.text: What position do you want to move your card to?

suggest_card.header: We created a suggestion for you

save_config.header: Cymerwch reolaeth ar eich rhyngwyneb defnyddiwr Lovelace
save_config.para: Gwneith Home Assistant gynnal eich rhyngwyneb defnyddiwr yn ddiofyn, a'i diweddaru pan fydd endidau neu gydrannau Lovelace newydd yn dod ar gael. Os ydych yn cymryd rheolaeth nawn ddim gwneud newidiadau awtomatig pellach i chi.
save_config.para_sure: A ydych yn siŵr bod chi eisiau rheoli eich rhyngwyneb defnyddiwr?
save_config.yaml_mode: Ydych yn defnyddio YAML modd, sy'n golygu nad ydych yn gallu newid eich Lovelace config o'r UI. Os ydych am newid Lovelace o UI, dileu 'modd: yaml' o eich cyfluniad Lovelace yn 'configuration.yaml.'
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:

migrate.para_no_id: Tydi'r elfen yma ddim efo ID. Plís ychwanegwch ID i'r elfen yma yn 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
migrate.para_migrate: Gall Home Assistant ychwanegu IDs i bob un o'ch cardiau ac edrychiadau yn awtomatig i chi wrth bwyso'r botwm 'Mudo ffurfweddiad'.

condition-editor.explanation: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.
condition-editor.invalid_config_text: The condition can not be tested because the configuration is not valid.

alarm-panel.name: Panel Larwm
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm panel card allows you to arm and disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

area.name: Area
area.description: The Area card automatically displays entities of a specific area.
area.show_camera: Show camera feed instead of area picture

calendar.name: Calendr
calendar.description: Mae'r cerdyn Calendr yn dangos calendr gan gynnwys gweddlun dydd, wythnos a restr

conditional.name: Amodol
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.

entities.name: Endidau
entities.description: Y cerdyn Endidau yw'r math mwyaf cyffredin o gerdyn. Mae'n grwpio eitemau gyda'i gilydd fewn i restrau.
entities.edit_special_row: Gweld manylion y rhes yma drwy glicio ar y botwm golygu

entity.name: Endid
entity.description: Mae'r cerdyn Endid yn rhoi trosolwg cyflym i chi o gyflwr eich endid.

button.name: Button
button.description: Mae'r cerdyn Botwm yn caniatáu ichi ychwanegu botymau i gyflawni tasgau.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Hidlo Endid
entity-filter.description: Mae'r cerdyn Hidlo Endid yn caniatáu ichi ddiffinio rhestr o endidau ydych eisiau diilyn pan fyddant mewn cyflwr penodol.

gauge.name: Medrydd
gauge.description: Mae'r cerdyn Gauge yn gerdyn sylfaenol sy'n caniatáu gweld data synhwyrydd yn weledol.

glance.name: Cipolwg
glance.description: Mae'r cerdyn Cipolwg yn ddefnyddiol i grwpio synwyryddion lluosog mewn trosolwg cryno.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.
grid.title: Title

logbook.name: Logbook
logbook.description: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.

history-graph.name: Graff Hanes
history-graph.description: Mae'r cerdyn Graff Hanes yn caniatáu ichi arddangos graff ar gyfer pob un o'r endidau a restrir.
history-graph.fit_y_data: Extend Y axis limits to fit data

statistics-graph.name: Statistics graph
statistics-graph.description: The Statistics graph card allows you to display a graph of the statistics for each of the entities listed.

statistic.name: Statistic
statistic.description: The Statistic card allows you to display a statistical value of an entity of a certain period.

horizontal-stack.name: Stac Fertigol
horizontal-stack.description: Mae'r cerdyn Stack Llorweddol yn caniatáu ichi bentyrru cardiau lluosog, felly maen nhw bob amser yn eistedd wrth ymyl ei gilydd yng ngofod un golofn.

humidifier.name: Humidifier
humidifier.description: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
humidifier.show_current_as_primary: Show current humidity as primary information

iframe.name: iFrame
iframe.description: Mae'r cerdyn Tudalen we yn eich galluogi i blannu eich hoff dudalen we i Home Assistant.

light.name: Golau
light.description: Mae'r cerdyn Golau yn caniatáu ichi newid disgleirdeb y golau.

generic.manual_description: Angen ychwanegu cerdyn 'custom' neu ddim ond eisiau ysgrifennu'r yaml?
generic.name: Enw
generic.paste_description: Paste a {type} card from the clipboard
generic.title: Title

map.name: Map
map.description: Y cerdyn Map sy'n caniatáu ichi arddangos endidau ar fap.

markdown.name: Marclawr
markdown.description: Defnyddir y cerdyn marcio i rendro Markdown.

media-control.name: Rheoli cyfryngau
media-control.description: Defnyddir y cerdyn Rheoli Cyfryngau i arddangos endidau chwaraewr cyfryngau ar ryngwyneb â rheolyddion hawdd eu defnyddio.

picture.name: Llun
picture.description: Mae'r cerdyn Lluniau yn caniatáu ichi osod delwedd i'w defnyddio ar gyfer llywio i amrywiol lwybrau yn eich rhyngwyneb neu i alw gwasanaeth.

picture-elements.name: Elfennau'r Llun
picture-elements.description: Mae'r cerdyn Elfennau Lluniau yn un o'r mathau mwyaf amlbwrpas o gardiau. Mae'r cardiau'n caniatáu ichi osod eiconau neu destun a hyd yn oed gwasanaethau! Ar ddelwedd yn seiliedig ar gyfesurynnau.

picture-entity.name: Endid Llun
picture-entity.description: Mae'r cerdyn Endid Lluniau yn arddangos endid ar ffurf delwedd. Yn lle delweddau o URL, gall hefyd ddangos y llun o endidau camera.

picture-glance.name: Cipolwg ar lun
picture-glance.description: Mae'r cerdyn Cipolwg Llun yn dangos delwedd a chyflyrau endidau cyfatebol fel eicon. Mae'r endidau ar yr ochr dde yn caniatáu toglo gweithredoedd, mae eraill yn dangos y dialog mwy o wybodaeth.

plant-status.name: Statws planhigyn
plant-status.description: Mae'r cerdyn Statws Planhigion ar gyfer yr holl fotanegwyr hyfryd allan yna.

sensor.name: Synhwyrydd
sensor.description: Mae'r cerdyn Synhwyrydd yn rhoi trosolwg cyflym o gyflwr eich synwyryddion gyda graff dewisol i ddelweddu newid dros amser.

todo-list.name: To-do list
todo-list.description: The to-do list card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your to-do list.
todo-list.integration_not_loaded: This card requires the `todo` integration to be set up.

thermostat.name: Thermostat
thermostat.description: Mae'r cerdyn Thermostat yn rhoi rheolaeth ar eich endid hinsawdd. Yn caniatáu ichi newid tymheredd a modd yr endid.
thermostat.show_current_as_primary: Show current temperature as primary information

tile.name: Tile
tile.description: The tile card gives you a quick overview of your entity. The card allow you to toggle the entity, show the more info dialog or custom actions.

vertical-stack.name: Stac Fertigol
vertical-stack.description: Mae'r cerdyn 'Vertical Stack' yn caniatáu ichi grwpio cardiau lluosog fel bod nhw bob tro yn eistedd yn yr un golofn.

weather-forecast.name: Rhagolwg tywydd
weather-forecast.description: Mae'r cerdyn rhagolygon tywydd yn dangos y tywydd. Defnyddiol iawn i'w cynnwys ar ryngwynebau y mae pobl yn eu harddangos ar y wal.

features.name: Features
features.no_compatible_available: No compatible features available for this entity

panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: Mae'r golwg yn cynnwys mwy nag un cerdyn, ond dim ond un cerdyn gall y golwg panel ei ddangos.

warning.starting: NDX IoT Platform is starting, not everything may be available yet
